channel.title: Sql on XuziYan

item.title: Sql经典题目的mysql实现①
item.description: 数据准备请看文章底部 点击我查看 题目 1、查询“01”课程比“02”课程成绩高的所有学生的学号 select a.s_id from (select sc.s_id, sc.s_score from score sc where sc.c_id='01') a, (select sc.s_id, sc.s_score from score sc where sc.c_id='02') b where a.s_score>b.s_score and a.s_id=b.s_id s_id 02 04 2、查询平均成绩大于60分的同学的学号和平均成绩 select sc.s_id , avg(sc.s_score) from score sc group by sc.s_id having avg(sc.s_score)>60 s_id avg(sc.s_score) 01 89.
